name: Star Wars D6 RPG Custom Character Sheet
name_original: Star Wars D6 RPG Custom Character Sheet
description:
Hey there! 

Here's a form-fillable PDF character sheet for the classic West End Games D6-based Star Wars RPG, compatible with all classic editions. It's free or PWYW and available for personal use. 

If there's enough interest I'll expand the pages to include character background sheets, vehicles, sidekicks and starships. 

MTFBWY!

Jez
